title: Was an 11-year-old girl forced to marry her rapist in Florida?
subtitle: The allegations of an 11-year-old girl who was forced to marry a man who raped her appear to be true, but who was presented in a misleading manner to the social media.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: An 11-year-old girl was photographed in shock and forced to marry a much older man who raped her.
